/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The buildings, primarily white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete jungle. Power lines crisscross above, a testament to the city's modern infrastructure. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
